short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enable this extension to know the analytics of any website with just a single click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Check the page analytics with one click. Skip the hassle of checking on Google Analytics where it's very tough to analyze the independent page analytics. We provide metrics such as page views, number of users on each different url. This extension will be connected with your GA4 account which imports page data for your easy access. 
 
Please note: This extension will only work on your own domains where you have the active Google Analytics. 

Disclaimer : This Chrome extension is an independent project developed by GSTECH TECHNOLOGY PRIVATE LIMITED  and is not affiliated with Google Inc. or its subsidiaries. While it incorporates features related to Google Page Analytics, it is not endorsed or supported by Google. Users should understand that they assume full responsibility for its usage, and  GSTECH TECHNOLOGY PRIVATE LIMITED  cannot be held liable for any consequences resulting from its use. By installing and using this extension, you agree to these terms.
